short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Conveniently access stats, history, and downloads for Chrome extensions, Android apps, Edge and Firefox add-ons

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access Chrome-Stats, Android-Stats, Edge-Stats, and Firefox-Stats directly from extension popup and browser side panel.

Allows you to quickly see more stats for each browse extension and Android app as you browse through Chrome Web Store, Google Play Store, Edge add-ons store, and Firefox add-ons store.

Features:
- View user count / rating stats
- View changes in user count and ratings in compared to one week ago
- View overall ranking, category ranking, and keyword ranking
- View risk impact and risk likelihood for each browser extension
- View permissions requested
- Quickly go to Chrome-Stats to analyze in more details
